altername_name: Umi no Nushi-tsuri - Takarajima ni Mukatte
name: Umi No Nushi Tsuri: Takarajimi NI Mukatte
overview: Umi No Nushi Tsuri: Takarajimi Ni Mukatte is another game in the fishing on island series by Victor Interactive. In this game the player controls a 12 year old boy that lives in a small village and starts a journey to catch a legendary fish. The game features 3 characters (only one is available at the beginning of the game), cute cartoon 2d graphics and is a mix between RPG and a fishing game.
